          throws java.io.IOException
        Creates the CsvReader class object
        Parameters:
        filePath - - File path of the csv file to be read
        separator - - Data separator to be used. Default value is ','
        quotechar - - Quote character for the data. Default value is '"'

        java.io.IOException

      • getData

        public java.lang.String getData(int row,
                       int column)
        Gets the data from csv file based on column and row number
        Parameters:
        column - Column number
        row - Row number
        Returns:
        The data at the said position. If the said row or column don't exists then return an empty string

      • getNoOfColumn

        public int getNoOfColumn(int rowNo)
        Returns the number of the column of the said row number passed
        Parameters:
        rowNo - - row number for which the number columns needs to be returned.
        Returns:
        return the no. of column in the specified row of the csv file
